about_me.des: A Lazy Man, busy in selecting * from t_woman where (age between 20 and 30) and (married=false) and (feature is fashion dignified) and (bodyMind is healthy), gentle and caring disposition is better, don't bother if you are not pure-hearted ...

projects.sr-ddcs: Sr-ddcs is a distributed realtime computation system based on storm and data collection technology which is providing service for enterprises decision and info publishment.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely
